location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Sketch map of the Aden Protectorate

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Manuscript; coloured ink on paperDimensions: 167 x 200mm

mods.abstract: The sketch map shows the Aden Protectorate and the surrounding area. It depicts not only the Protectorate's border with Yemen (outlined in red ink) but also its south coast. Two place names, Wadi Hadramaut and Qishn, are underlined in red. Three islands: Perim (to the south-west) and Abd el Kuri [‘Abd al Kūrī] and Socotra (in the south-east) are also featured.
